title: Human images from world's first total-body scanner unveiled

title_detail.value: Human images from world's first total-body scanner unveiled

summary: EXPLORER, the world's first medical imaging scanner that can capture a 3D picture of the whole human body at once, has produced its first scans.

summary_detail.value: EXPLORER, the world's first medical imaging scanner that can capture a 3D picture of the whole human body at once, has produced its first scans.
